alert.note: Alert for Gibson; Pike (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 7:20PM EDT until June 29 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT/745 PM EDT/ FOR WABASH...NORTHEASTERN EDWARDS...CENTRAL GIBSON AND WESTERN PIKE COUNTIES... At 620 PM CDT/720 PM EDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mount Carmel, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Princeton, Mount Carmel, Lancaster, West Salem, Patoka, Allendale, Bellmont, Hazleton, Bone Gap and Keensburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
